    • execFindSuggestion

      public List<String[]> execFindSuggestion(String camp)
      Generates a list of all suggestions for a given camp, including both replied and unreplied suggestions.
      Specified by:
      execFindSuggestion in interface SuggestionReviewServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      camp - the camp for which to find suggestions
      Returns:
      a list of string arrays representing the suggestions

    • execFindUnrepliedSuggestion

      public List<String[]> execFindUnrepliedSuggestion(String camp)
      Retrieves a list of unreplied suggestions for a given camp.
      Specified by:
      execFindUnrepliedSuggestion in interface SuggestionReviewServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      camp - the camp for which to find unreplied suggestions
      Returns:
      a list of unreplied suggestions as an array of strings, or null if there are no suggestions for the camp

    • execReviewSuggestion

      Parameters:

    • reviewSuggestion

      public void reviewSuggestion(SuggestionController suggestionController, SuggestionServiceInterface suggestionService, String[] suggestionToReview)
      Reviews a suggestion and updates its status and decision in the suggestion file.
      Specified by:
      reviewSuggestion in interface SuggestionReviewServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      suggestionController - The suggestion controller object.
      suggestionService - The suggestion service interface.
      suggestionToReview - The suggestion to be reviewed.
